resources.string:
"Uploading photos: 

"
"Take a clear photo of the flag you want to search for." "Make sure the picture is not blurry, the flag is the main focus of the photo, and the" "flag is very visible in the photo. 

" "Once you have a good photo, select the ID Flag button from the main menu." "You will have to select the photo from your phones photo library. The app will then" "allow you to crop the image of the flag. Crop out the entire background, so that only" "the flag you wish to identify remains. Select done when you are happy with the photo.

" "The app will now determine which flag is in the photo based on Colour, Shape, and GPS

"
"Viewing Previously Searched Flags:

" "From the Main Menu, select the Previous Results button. The app will then display the last" "three correctly found flag countries. By selecting the country, you will br brought to the" "Wiki page on that country.

"
"Viewing Most Searched Flags:

" "From the Main Menu, select the Most Searched button. The app will then display the top" "most searched flags countries. By selecting the country, you will br brought to the" "Wiki page on that country.

"
